description: Digging our paws in, California style. Whether you're one that prefers to swim upstream, float your way down, or wade through the middle–the River Bear™ is all about going with the flow and catching the best views. Celebrating the wild creatures of Mountain Hardwear's roots, this design is printed on a soft, 100% cotton base for the kind of comfort you can only find when you're way out there in places like these.
name: Mountain Hardwear River Bear LS - Mens
